definition.name: RadioGroup
definition.description: A radio group component that allows users to select a single option from a list of choices. Built on top of Radix UI's RadioGroup primitive, this component provides a styled container for radio options with proper accessibility and keyboard navigation support.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the radio group container

properties.description: Accepts all properties from Radix UI's RadioGroup.Root component

definition.visualLayout: A vertical or horizontal group of radio buttons with consistent spacing between items. The container uses CSS Grid with a gap of 2 units between radio items.
interactions: Users can select one option at a time
Keyboard navigation between options using arrow keys

definition.name: RadioGroupItem
definition.description: An individual radio button item that can be used within a RadioGroup. Features a circular design with a fill animation when selected, and includes proper focus and disabled states styling.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the radio item

value.description: The value associated with this radio option

disabled.description: Whether the radio option is disabled

properties.description: Accepts all properties from Radix UI's RadioGroup.Item component

definition.visualLayout: A circular button with a 4x4 size, featuring a border in the primary color. When selected, shows a filled circle indicator. Includes hover, focus, and disabled states with appropriate visual feedback.
interactions: Shows focus ring when focused via keyboard
Displays a filled circle when selected
Appears disabled with reduced opacity when disabled prop is true
